product_description: Strategic ripping and cutoff hems play up the casual-cool style of high-waist denim shorts that are ready for the weekend.
product_details_and_care:
Strategic ripping and cutoff hems play up the casual-cool style of high-waist denim shorts that are ready for the weekend.
3" inseam; 22" leg opening; 10 1/2" front rise; 14" back rise (size 26)
Zip fly with button closure

62% cotton, 30% polyester, 8% viscose
